author: civanch
body:
#### PR description:
Backport of ZDC simulation and modifier for heavy ion https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/43493, which extend modifier for heavy ion FullSim for Run3. It is the same as #43494 in 13_0_X. This PR should not affect any pp workflow.


#### PR validation:
private


#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for: provide ZDC simulation for PbPb run
title: [13_0_HeavyIons_X SIM] Backport of ZDC simulation
